p: Standard substances of oxygenated heterocyclic compounds (OHCs): meranzin hydrate, auraptenol, meranzin, isomeranzin, osthole, oxypeucedanin, 3,5,6,7,8,3ʹ,4ʹ-heptamethoxyflavone, 6ʹ,7ʹ-dihydroxybergamottin, isoimperatorin, imperatorin, 8-geranyloxypsoralen, auraptene and psoralen were purchased from Yuanye Biotech (Shanghai China). Tangeretin and 6ʹ,7ʹ-epoxybergamottin were purchased from ChromaDex (Irvine, USA). Nobiletin was purchased from TRC (Toronto, Canada). 6ʹ,7ʹ-Epoxyauraptene was obtained by using a preparative liquid chromatography separation from pomelo CPEO (details can be found in Supplementary Information. Other related nonvolatile standards such as phenolic acids and flavanone glycosides were purchased from CRMRM, Ltd. (Beijing, China). The stock solution of the individual standard was approximately 1 mg mL −1 in methanol or dimethyl sulfoxide and was stored at −20°C.
